text: Arthur Ganong "Art" Davis (November 29, 1934 â€“ January 29, 2021) was an American football player. He played at Mississippi State University in 1952-55 and for one season with the Pittsburgh Steelers in the National Football League (NFL) in 1956. He died of Parkinson's disease on January 29, 2021, in Starkville, Mississippi at age 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Sportspeople from Mississippi Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease
title: Art Davis (American football)
